sys_ui_message.key: your accumulated leave may be encashed or used as holiday leave instead of annual leave. please note that you can only encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year.
sys_ui_message.message: Your accumulated leave may be encashed or used as holiday leave instead of annual leave. Please note that you can only encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: your accumulated leave may be encashed or used as holiday leave instead of annual leave. please note that you can only encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year.
